appendix.title: MRNET Format Strings
appendix.para: Following the % character introducing a conversion there may be a number of flag characters. u, h, l, and a are special modifiers meaning unsigned, short, long and array, respectivley. The full set of conversions are:

row.entry: Matches an array of signed 8-bit characters
Matches an array of unsigned 8-bit characters
Matches an array of signed 16-bit decimal integers
Matches an array of unsigned 16-bit decimal integers
Matches an array of signed 32-bit decimal integers
Matches an array of unsigned 32-bit decimal integers
Matches an array of signed 64-bit decimal integers
Matches an array of unsigned 64-bit decimal integers
Matches an array of 32-bit floating-point numbers
Matches an array of 64-bit floating-point numbers
